attributes.action: May to resign and a new General Election lowering the age of voting to 16
attributes.background: May and her party have destroyed the meaning of democracy. It’s time for the people to speak again! Have May resign as PM and a new General Election with the age of voting lowered to the age of 16

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister.

You might like to consider signing these petitions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235503
